page.title: 09A CHILD'S DAY;DRAYTON
page.content: At 8 o'clock I get up and have a cup of tea,then I have my{breakfast, which is usually cornflakes.I wash my face,clean my teeth and get my bag ready to go to{school.}My school is about a mile and a half from our house,and my mother drives my sister and I there in the car. At school we work on several subjects;we do Maths and English in the morning,and in the afternoon we do History, Geography, Science, and P.E. amongst other things.I normally have a hot{school lunch,}but sometimes I have a packed lunch. After school finishes at 3.30,I go home and have{tea,}which is a hot meal like fish & chips.Then I either watch{T.V.}or practice my air-rifle shooting on our 25 metre range.After a bit of studying I have a snack{supper, watch a bit more T.V. and go to{bed.
